title.value: Rapid, automated nerve histomorphometry through open‐source artificial intelligence
title.justification: The title captures the essence of the paper which is focused on developing an automated deep learning model for nerve histomorphometry.
title.quote: Rapid, automated nerve histomorphometry through open‐source artificial intelligence

extractions.description: This paper reports on the development and validation of a deep learning model for automated nerve fiber segmentation and histomorphometry using light microscopic images. The model aims to improve the accuracy and speed of morphometric analysis compared to traditional manual methods.

type.justification: The paper involves the development and validation of a deep learning model through practical experimentation and analysis to achieve specific outcomes in nerve histomorphometry, thus it is empirical in nature.
type.quote: We aimed to develop and validate a deep learning model for automated segmentation and histomorphometry.

name.justification: The research is focused on developing a deep learning model for analyzing biomedical images of nerve tissues.
name.quote: We aimed to develop and validate a deep learning model for automated segmentation and histomorphometry of myelinated peripheral nerve fibers from light microscopic images.

name.justification: The paper is centered around the histological analysis of nerve tissues.
name.quote: aimed to develop and validate a deep learning model for automated segmentation and histomorphometry of myelinated peripheral nerve fibers from light microscopic images.

name.justification: Involves the application of computer vision techniques for image segmentation.
name.quote: A convolutional neural network integrated in the AxonDeepSeg framework was trained for automated axon/myelin segmentation.

name.justification: AxonDeepSeg is mentioned as the framework used for training the deep learning model for axon/myelin segmentation.
name.quote: A convolutional neural network integrated in the AxonDeepSeg framework was trained for automated axon/myelin segmentation.

is_contributed.justification: The paper describes extending the AxonDeepSeg framework specifically for light microscopic images, indicating a contribution.
is_contributed.quote: We aimed to extend the AxonDeepSeg framework by adding a model specifically trained for axon/myelin segmentation in light microscopic images.

is_executed.justification: The model training and execution details, including GPU utilization, are provided.
is_executed.quote: The training was done on a GeForce GTX TITAN X GPU and took 9 h.

is_compared.justification: The model's results were compared against manual histomorphometry.
is_compared.quote: Automated morphometry results, including axon diameter, myelin sheath thickness and g-ratio were compared against manual straight-line measurements.

referenced_paper_title.value: AxonDeepSeg: Automatic axon and myelin segmentation from microscopy data using convolutional neural networks.
referenced_paper_title.justification: The reference to AxonDeepSeg mentions previous work relevant to the current study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: AxonDeepSeg, is an open-source software library for axon/myelin segmentation across various microscopy modalities (https:// a​ xond​eepseg.​readt​hedocs.​io/) ^{24}.

name.justification: The dataset consists of light-microscopic cross-sectional images of osmium tetroxide-stained rat nerves.
name.quote: A convolutional neural network integrated in the AxonDeepSeg framework was trained...using a dataset of light-microscopic cross-sectional images of osmium tetroxide-stained rat nerves including various axonal regeneration stages.

referenced_paper_title.justification: The dataset is described as part of the experimental setup, but no specific reference paper is cited for this dataset.
referenced_paper_title.quote: datasets of light-microscopic cross-sectional images of osmium tetroxide-stained rat nerves including various axonal regeneration stages.

name.justification: AxonDeepSeg is crucial to the deep learning model's implementation for axon and myelin segmentation.
name.quote: A convolutional neural network integrated in the AxonDeepSeg framework was trained for automated axon/myelin segmentation.

referenced_paper_title.value: AxonDeepSeg: Automatic axon and myelin segmentation from microscopy data using convolutional neural networks.
referenced_paper_title.justification: The AxonDeepSeg software is central to the study and its functionalities.
referenced_paper_title.quote: AxonDeepSeg, is an open-source software library for axon/myelin segmentation across various microscopy modalities
